questions.question_text:
A VMware vSphere 6.x Administrator is tasked with configuring vRealize Log Insight.
What three ports can be used for syslog? (Choose three.)
Which password meets the default password requirements in ESXi 6.x?
Which two statements are true when configuring a virtual flash resources (vFlash)? (Choose two.)

choices.A: Virtual Machines cannot reside on the virtual flash resource.
choices.D: vFlash resources are managed at the ESXi host level.
choices.C: vSphere DRS does not support vFlash resources.
choices.B: Only Shared Storage can be configured as a virtual flash resource.

choices.A: All VMkernel ports used for iSCSI connectivity reside in the same broadcast domain and IP subnet.
choices.D: Array Target iSCSI ports reside in the same broadcast domain and IP subnet as the VMkernel ports.
choices.C: All VMkernel ports used for iSCSI connectivity reside in the same vSwitch.
choices.B: LACP other link aggregation was used on the ESXi hosts uplinks to connect to the physical switches.

questions.question_text:
After enabling iSCSI port binding on ESXi hosts, a vSphere Administrator can no longer reach an iSCSI Array Target from the configured software iSCSI initiators.
Which can be the root cause for the failure?

discussion.content:
https://docs.vmware.com/en/VMware-vSphere/5.5/com.vmware.vsphere.storage.doc/GUID-4C19E34E-764C-4069-9D9F-D0F779F2A96C.html?hWord=N4IghgNiBcIJYGUDCCCSACADgewE4Bd0AjOAOwBMyBzEAXyA

All other options ACD are as per guidelines. So the correct Ans is B

questions.question_text:
One of your virtual machines (VM) has performance issues and sometimes in unresponsive.
Which VM file must be checked in order to find the root cause?
